author: Eric Jeschke
content:
If there is ever such a thing as "photoshop hell", it's described here...  ðŸ™‚  But seriously, nice to see how it worked out!

As a fellow software developer, I'm fascinated how you can spend that kind of time on the computer outside of work.  I suppose it is a different kind of work entirely, and if I loved photoshop, maybe I could get lost in it too. As it is, I can only manage a minimal amount of post-processing.  As they say,vive la diffÃ©rence!
